column4: it works best if you throw random values at it until everything works smooth :)
thepub: so you sure you have libdvdcss2 installed?
thePub: note that libdvdcss2 is illegal in some countries. Can be found from Penguin Liberation Army repos
it's all working now, just took a couple of restarts.  Agent was probably right to a degree that I hadn't found all the zombie processes from earlier attempts.
